STILLER




(Stiller is pulled down. He growls and rises to one knee, tryin=
g to punch Arrow in the face...)

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: S=
oulstice Omega 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, July 12, 20=
01 7:48 PM
  Subject: Re: Chivtrons under attack... again/Clash


  Arrow i=
s kneed in the face and goes down hard. He tries to pull Stiller over by hi=
s leg...

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: *Orchid* 
    To: nbw=
rpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Thursday, July 12, 2001 7:24 PM
    Subject:=
 Re: Chivtrons under attack... again/Clash


    STILLER





    Stiller: =
You better tell your friends not to ruin this. I wanted a fair fight and th=
ose bastards are ruining it!...



    (Stiller tries to knee Arrow in the =
face...)

      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: Soulstice Omega 
=
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Thursday, July 12, 2001 7:02 =
PM
      Subject: Re: Chivtrons under attack... again/Clash


      Arrow d=
ucks the palm and steps right into Termitron's shots meant for Stiller. He'=
s hit by them in the back and goes down to one knee.

      Burning Hammer =
stares at Perplex is stasis lock while everyone yelled "save Trinity!" He s=
hakes his head...

        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: *Orc=
hid* 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Thursday, July 12, =
2001 6:08 PM
        Subject: Re: Chivtrons under attack... again/Clash


 =
       STILLER




        (Stiller is headbutted in the face. He bends ove=
r some, wiping mech fluid from his face. Then he springs up, thrusting the =
palm of his hand upwards at Arrow's face...)

          ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
          From: Soulstice Omega 
          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroup=
s.com 
          Sent: Thursday, July 12, 2001 1:40 AM
          Subject: R=
e: Chivtrons under attack... again/Clash


          Arrow is hit but quick=
ly recovers and actually tries to headbutt Stiller...

            ----- Or=
iginal Message ----- 
            From: *Orchid* 
            To: nbwrpg@ya=
hoogroups.com 
            Sent: Wednesday, July 11, 2001 8:33 PM
         =
   Subject: Re: Chivtrons under attack... again/Clash


            STILLER=





            (Stiller ducks the jab and swings a punch at Arrow's stoma=
ch...)

              From: Sou=
lstice Omega 
              To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
              Sent:=
 Wednesday, July 11, 2001 4:11 AM
              Subject: Re: Chivtrons unde=
r attack... again/Clash


              Arrow approaches Stiller and swing =
a right hook at his head...

=

bject: Re: Chivtrons under attack... again/Clash

uly 08, 2001 11:17 PM

ing Hammer.

                  Arrow: You take Perplex back inside.

      =
            Burning Hammer nods and Arrow approaches Stiller...

          =
          ----- Original Message ----- 
                    From: *Orchid* =

                    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                    Sent: =
Sunday, July 08, 2001 10:46 PM
                    Subject: Re: Chivtrons u=
nder attack... again/Clash


                    STILLER




              =
      (Stiller's smile grow larger as he waits for Arrow...)

             =
         ----- Original Message ----- 
                      From: Soulstic=
e Omega 
                      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                =
      Sent: Sunday, July 08, 2001 1:21 AM
                      Subject: Re=
: Chivtrons under attack... again/Clash

aches Stiller, looking very angry...

l Message -----

                  =
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                        Sent: Saturday, J=
uly 07, 2001 8:05 PM
                        Subject: Re: Chivtrons under a=
ttack... again/Clash


                        STILLER





               =
         (Stiller smiles and puts his crossbow in it's holster. He clutches=
 his fists and stares at Arrow.. He wanted a fist fight. Stiller motions fo=
r Arrow to come...)

                          ----- Original Message -----=
 
                          From: Soulstice Omega 
                        =
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com

y 07, 2001 6:29 PM

ttack... again/Clash


                          Arrow ducks the arrow (hee=
hee) and fires back 7 shots at Stiller...

     =

ct: Re: Chivtrons under attack... again/Clash


                           =
 MCGOWAN / BARRYMORE / STILLER / ALBA / VIRGO / LEE / DEPP





           =
                 (McGowan jumps over the 2 energy balls and fires a missile=
 at Nightlight.)



                            (Barrymore takes one of the=
 energy balls to the chest but dodges the other with a side jump. She fires=
 6 laser beams at Nightlight.)



                            (Depp is stru=
ck by both energy balls, taking them in the left shoulder. Depp fires 7 sho=
ts at Nightlight.)



                            (Alba ducks the energy ba=
lls and pulls a pin from a grenade and throws it in front of the Chivtron b=
ase.)



                            (Stiller growls and fires an arrow at =
Arrow.)



                            (Lee fires a ball of fire at Nightli=
ght's legs, attempting to trip her up.)



                            (Vir=
go fires a red energy draining dart at Nightlight...)
